hero.title: Electrical Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: Founder & COO of Nabbah
hero.description: Interested in embedded systems, robotics, AI, and IoT solutions that make a real difference.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Mohammed Bosaid, an electrical engineering student at Jubail Industrial College and COO of Nabbah, a tech startup focused on inclusive assistive technology. I'm currently training at Smart Methods in robotics and IoT, a McKinsey Forward graduate, and an active learner at the Future Skills Academy (UNDP & MBRF).

experience.title: Experience
items: Member, Electrical Engineering Club, Jubail Industrial College
